pages.title: Hot Biome Foraging
pages.text: Foraging in Hot Biomes can mean life or death, so knowing the plants around you is important.

pages.title: Tomatos
pages.text: Tomatos grow high up in Shattered Savannas

pages.title: Tumbleweeds
pages.text: Tumbleweeds can be found in Deserts, they also often have useful materials stuck inside them.

pages.title: Sugar Cane
pages.text: Sugar Cane can be found in Deserts, Rivers, and Lakes. It's very useful in many culinary recipes & for producing Fiber.

pages.title: Cacti
pages.text: Cacti grow in Deserts and produce a wonderful green dye.
